events.description: A resumption of selling pressure in the technology sector driven by AI concerns and valuation levels.

events.event_name: Bank of England Monetary Policy Decision
events.description: The central bank's decision on interest rates.
The European Central Bank's decision on interest rates.
Release of quarterly financial results from major European companies.

facts.fact_text: The STOXX 50 and STOXX 600 fell by 0.6% and 0.7% respectively.

evidences.evidence_text: Both the STOXX 50 and the STOXX 600 extended losses on Thursday, falling 0.6% and 0.7%, respectively

facts.fact_text: The Bank of England and the ECB kept borrowing costs unchanged.

evidences.evidence_text: monetary policy decisions from the Bank of England and the ECB that left borrowing costs unchanged as expected

facts.fact_text: BBVA shares fell more than 6% following its results.

evidences.evidence_text: BBVA tumbled more than 6% as its results failed to meet investor expectations.

facts.fact_text: ArcelorMittal reported a Q4 profit that exceeded expectations.

evidences.evidence_text: ArcelorMittal was up 1% after reporting a stronger-than-expected Q4 profit.

claims.claim_text: The tech sell-off is linked to persistent concerns over AI-related disruption and high valuations.

evidences.evidence_text: as a global tech sell-off resumed amid persistent concerns over AI-related disruption and elevated valuations

claims.claim_text: Maersk expects a decline in earnings in 2026.
claims.author: Maersk

evidences.evidence_text: Maersk plunged 4.5 after warning of a decline in earnings in 2026

claims.claim_text: Shell's profit miss was caused by lower crude prices.

evidences.evidence_text: Shell fell 1% after missing profit estimates amid lower crude prices.

evidence.evidence_text: Both the STOXX 50 and the STOXX 600 extended losses on Thursday... as a global tech sell-off resumed
